org.ssrad.spacebit.nodes

Class AbstractNode

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.jme3.scene.Spatial
      • com.jme3.scene.Node
        • org.ssrad.spacebit.nodes.AbstractNode
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.jme3.asset.CloneableSmartAsset, com.jme3.collision.Collidable, com.jme3.export.Savable, java.lang.Cloneable, ICollidable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AbstractScreen, Ape, Asteroid, Banana, BlackHole, FireExplosion, HealthBar, Heart, HeartBar, Laser, Planet, Rocket, ScoreBar, Ship, ShockWaveExplosion, Star, TimeBar, TorusCoin, Ufo, WarpCore

    public abstract class AbstractNode
extends com.jme3.scene.Node
implements ICollidable
    Super class for all entities.

    I know that jmonkey wiki advises not to use an own node super class but I don't trust their implementation.
